channel.title: Algoritm Help/ 2D Shapes Help
channel.description:
I am writing a simulation on Reverse Osmosis and I need help with two things. The second thing will be done after the first thing.
The first thing is I need help defining a Square with boundaries and line segments within that square. The line segments with defined boundaries that have wholes in between them to represent a "permeable membrane." Then i need help with setting so many circles to represent molecules that flow in between the two sides. Then comes the second part.
The second part is for an algorithm and a method that counts the amount of "molecules" that pass through the permeable membrane and then counts per second.
What I currently have is a system to tick every second 300 times a given int that = 0 so it says, "1 Second Tick, " + moleculeCount + " have passed through the membrane." It writes it onto the Command Prompt and a text document. If anyone could help me I would be most greatful.

item.title: Algoritm Help/ 2D Shapes Help
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

I’ve actually been able to set conditions and variables for different scenarios for the simulation to get different sets of data to compare. I actually won a scholarship with it aswell so I amm excited to minor in Computer Science.

Read full topic

item.title: Algoritm Help/ 2D Shapes Help
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

Rictoo:

I’m fairly sure this is a bit more complex than you believe it is. You also have to take into account molecular collisions, interactions between solute and solvent (solvation), speed of movement (depending on enthalpy, etc.), and probably many other things that I can’t think of at the moment. Computational chemistry isn’t a joke.

nor is computational biology (at mosty problems are NP hard_

Read full topic

@mod_taharok wrote:

Needs more information. Under what conditions will the particles permeate the membrane? Can molecules be added, removed?

item.title: Algoritm Help/ 2D Shapes Help
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

I am writing a simulation on Reverse Osmosis and I need help with two things. The second thing will be done after the first thing.

The first thing is I need help defining a Square with boundaries and line segments within that square. The line segments with defined boundaries that have wholes in between them to represent a “permeable membrane.” Then i need help with setting so many circles to represent molecules that flow in between the two sides. Then comes the second part.

The second part is for an algorithm and a method that counts the amount of “molecules” that pass through the permeable membrane and then counts per second.

What I currently have is a system to tick every second 300 times a given int that = 0 so it says, “1 Second Tick, " + moleculeCount + " have passed through the membrane.” It writes it onto the Command Prompt and a text document. If anyone could help me I would be most greatful.
